title: Fallen Angel, Part 1
description:
On the first day of her holiday, Brooke Stiles meets the dark-eyed and dangerous Robert Stone.  Stone has never had a normal relationship for fear of his past being exposed. Not knowing how to love or respect, he struggles with his overwhelming feelings for a woman who makes him question everything he believes in.  This is a story about an extraordinary woman who meets a remarkable man and has to discover if she is strong enough to take on his life.  Fallen Angel, Part 1 is a 
Mafia Romance
 and intended for readers over the age of 18. Contains graphic scenes of a sexual nature. This series is complete.
author: Tracie Podger
